## Type of Change

<!-- Check all that apply -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Refactor (code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature)
- [ ] Documentation (changes to docs only)
- [ ] Chore (dependency updates, config changes, etc.)

---

## Pre-Merge Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project style (ESLint passes)
- [ ] TypeScript has no errors (`pnpm typecheck`)
- [ ] No `console.log` statements left in code (use `logger` instead)
- [ ] New code has appropriate comments/JSDoc

### Testing

- [ ] Unit tests pass (`pnpm test`)
- [ ] New features have test coverage
- [ ] E2E tests pass if applicable (`pnpm e2e`)

### Documentation

- [ ] README updated if needed
- [ ] TECHNICAL_ROADMAP.md updated if this completes a phase
- [ ] JSDoc added for new public functions/components

### Manual Verification

<!-- For reviewers: verify these work as expected -->

- [ ] App starts without errors (`pnpm dev`)
- [ ] Changed features work as described
- [ ] No visual regressions in affected areas
- [ ] Settings persist correctly (if applicable)
